message.body: Can u catch a train? I'll buy your ticket n you can pay me back in twenty years.
Lemme look - I'm a little worried about timing for both of us making it to our night shows, too!
K :) Lemme know if i can help make it work, muff!
Still in bed with the boy - gonna look up trains soon :)
Babyyyyyyy the only transport I can find from Hartford to Sharon is a bus that goes south to Stamford and then north to Sharon - total of 4.5 hours!!!!!! I'm sad this maybe won't work??? BAHHHHHH
Lol. He's an animal. Miss u muffler. Hows da show?
Miss YOU muffling. Show is amazing, exhausting. Sleep is most important thing. How is Doubt? Did you open yet? Crowds? Reactions?
I don't think my last text went through. Service sucks ass. Opening was fantastic n last night was a mess, but we got a standing o? Whatever, theatre is fucking weird. Lol
Theatre is BIZARRE. I want to call tomorrow and get stories? Hope you're feeling grand about your work, Muffington.
